text:
Abstract | Software Engineer | San Francisco | Remote or Onsite | Fulltime

Wanna work for a diverse and inclusive company that puts people first? Here at Abstract women represent a third of our employees, two-thirds of senior leadership and half of our investor board. African American and Latinx employees represent 20% of our company. LBGTQ+ people represent at 14% of our company.

If you've got solid experience in Obj C, C++ or Go then reach out so we can talk! We care more about your ability to learn and solve problems than your specific language experience.

Details: https://boards.greenhouse.io/abstract/jobs/4037890002

Interested? Apply above or ping me at rob@goabstract.com
